sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const initialValues = { ProductName: "", Quantity: "", Price: "", Amount: "", Created: "", Updated: "", DueDate: "", BillNo: "", GrossAmount: "", GstAmount:"", NetAmount: "", Status: "", Note: "" } const InputBox = () => { const [status, setStatus] = useState(false); const [values, setValues] = useState(initialValues); const statusHandler = () => { if (!status) setStatus(true); else setStatus(false); }; const inputChangeHandler = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setValues({ ...values, [name]: value }) } return ( <> {status && (

Product Name:

Quantity:

Price: $

Amount: $

Created:

Updated:

Due Date:

Bill No:

Gross Amount: $

GST Amount: $

Net Amount: $

Status:

Note:

)} ); }; export default InputBox;
